insporation* Archive

Archive repository for builds of the insporation* Android client for diaspora*

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://jhass.github.io/insporation/fdroid/archive

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
EC 79 2A 58 B3 9D F9 FB B4 66 FB 10 0E 30 E3 84 2F 22 9F DB C6 E2 8D 32 C4 17 F6 A5 B3 0E CC AE
